title: Jo Yapp appointed Worcester Warriors Women's director of rugby after dismal start to Tyrells Premier 15s season
text:
Former England scrum-half Jo Yapp has been appointed as Worcester Warriors’ director of rugby, just two months after joining the Premier 15s side as a skills coach.

The 39-year-old succeeds Roy Davies, who agreed to leave the club by mutual consent last month two games into the new season having guided Worcester to two wins in the Tyrrells Premier 15s under his tenure.

Yapp’s appointment comes at a crucial time for Worcester, who remain bottom of the league after four defeats, the latest of which came in a 55-3 hammering by champions Saracens at Allianz Park on Sunday.

description: Former England scrum-half Jo Yapp has been appointed as Worcester Warriors’ director of rugby, just two months after joining the Premier 15s side as a skills coach.
